description: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = number of orbits of order exactly k under doubling map which remain in a semicircle, with k dividing n.
comments: If alpha=exp(2i*pi*a(d,n)/(2^n - 1)), the orbit of alpha has period n and stays in the semi-circle of minimal argument alpha.
author: Francois Maurel (maurel(AT)sequoia.ens.fr)
